wikipedia_page.main: Philip Robinson (21 November 1942 – 1989) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger. Active in the Football League between 1960 and 1970, Robinson made 300 career appearances, scoring 31 goals.

response: Philip or Phil Robinson may refer to:
*Phil Robinson, Australian bassist of The Cockroaches
* Phil Robinson (politician), American politician and member of the Ohio House of Representatives
* Phil Robinson (born 1978), Faster than Barry Allen
